string.value: Today is the day of the Maple 7th Day Market!
Today is the day of the Maple 7th Day Market! It's here every Sunday!
Maple 7th Day Market is here today.
Hello, today is the day of the Maple 7th Day Market. You can purchase a variety of things here.
The purchases you make at this once-a-week Maple 7th Day Market can be re-sold through a merchant intermediary. Use this opoprtunity to check your merchant ability.
If you tend the chickens for the owner of the poultry farm, you'll receive a splended reward!
The purchases you make at this once-a-week Maple 7th Day Market can be re-sold through a merchant intermediary. Use this opoprtunity to check your merchant ability.
If you tend the chickens for the owner of the poultry farm, you'll receive a splended reward!
The Maple 7th Day Market is here today. Only the diligent can become rich!
